name: Let's Kill Spooky
description:
Many people wanted to kill Spooky in my game "My 6000 Horrors - https://fellowplayer.itch.io/my-6000-horrors" so I decided to build a separate game devoted to her battle only.

With a Plasma Gun and a little extra help, stop Spooky from taking over before she and her experiments kill everyone including you. If you want to follow the full story from the beginning it all began here - My 5000 Nightmares: https://fellowplayer.itch.io/my-5000-nightmares

WASD - Move
Shift - Run
LMB - Fire

YouTuber: Fellowplayer
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXzcduiD99hcDMhhCzByRiA
